動物用藥品名稱: 禽必威雞新城病、傳染性鼻炎不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 先靈葆雅動物藥品股份有限公司
地址: WIM DE KORVERSTRAAT 35 5831 AN BOXMEER, THE NETHERLANDS
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病及傳染性鼻炎。
ingredients: 1 PD70 CHICKEN (CHICKEN-PROTECTIVE DOSE 70%) H.P. SEROTYPE A;1 PD70 CHICKEN (CHICKEN-PROTECTIVE DOSE 70%) H.P. SEROTYPE B;1 PD70 CHICKEN (CHICKEN-PROTECTIVE DOSE 70%) H.P. SEROTYPE C;50 PD50(PROTECTIVE DOSE 50%) INACTIVATED ND VIRUS, STRAIN CLONE 30H.P. SEROTYPE A(083株)，H.P. SEROTYPE B(SPROSS株)，H.P. SEROTYPE C(H18株)
成分: NOBILIS CORYZA + ND CONTAINS THREE SEROTYPES (A, B AND C) OF THEHAEMOPHILUS PARAGALLINARUM (H.P.) BACTERIA AND THE STRAINCLONE 30 OF THE NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS. THE BACTERIA AREINACTIVATED WITH THIOMERSAL AND THE VIRUS WITH FORMALIN.THE VACCINE CONTAINS PER DOSE OF 0.5 ML AT LEAST:
